title: Blue Essence bug HELP!
body: So when I logged in after the update it said I got 24000 blue essence for previous runes etc, But it has not gone into my blue essence. Is this a bug because I have read many other posts about this, and will all the people who have this issue get their essence ?

replies.body: If you have finished the 'Rune collector' mission and your BE total isn't updated, go to your Loot tab and redeem them there.
Wow didn't think to check there, thx
